tweet_text:
@Alice_comfy @oLevLovesLove More importantly, risk in crypto often comes down to large, systemic risks + smaller local risks. Because it's cyclical a lot of the risk is "will this cycle end right now?!"

You can create local risks using pairs or leverage, but the "big risk" is a one-off thing.
text_en: More importantly, risk in crypto often comes down to large, systemic risks + smaller local risks. Because it's cyclical a lot of the risk is "will this cycle end right now?!" You can create local risks using pairs or leverage, but the "big risk" is a one-off thing.
reply_text: More importantly, risk in crypto often comes down to large, systemic risks + smaller local risks. Because it's cyclical a lot of the risk is "will this cycle end right now?!" You can create local risks using pairs or leverage, but the "big risk" is a one-off thing.
